author: wsjcom
title: Like Karaoke but Can’t Sing? Introducing the Booth for One
text:
SHANGHAI—Cao Zhengning loves karaoke but fears her tone-deaf vocals irritate any audience.
“I just feel sorry for people who have to listen to my singing,” says the 35-year-old sportswriter who has been self-conscious about it since childhood.
Ms. Cao now indulges her pleasure in private. On her way to shop for groceries in a Shanghai mall,...
